scene_description_enriched: A group of figures, likely the Apostles, are depicted looking upwards with expressions of awe and devotion. They are gathered in a landscape setting with rolling hills and trees in the background. One figure, possibly Christ, is ascending into the sky, depicted as a purple-robed form with outstretched arms. The figures are dressed in colorful robes and some have halos, indicating their saintly status. The scene captures the moment of the Ascension of Christ.
